LanguageData.Axi_AMR_M107_21CA.label: Barrett M107
LanguageData.Axi_AMR_M107_21CA.description: The Barrett M107 is a legendary anti-materiel rifle, having been used by many a well-known mercenary company and military sniper team. Its massive .50-caliber armor-piercing rounds are specifically designed to pierce thick armor, and is even known to punch straight through the tough exteroirs of mechanoid centipedes with ease.
